column6: It's a basic floor used to expand the foundation in space
It's a neater floor than the basic floor
It's a colorful floor with lights
It's a block where you can go to the back of the spaceship by going up
This is the basic ceiling that you use to make the roof.
It is a neater ceiling than the basic ceiling.
It's a colorful ceiling with lights.
It's a basic wall that holds up the floor
It's a neater wall than the basic wall
It's a door that you can open and close
It's a basic window through which you can see the outside
It's a wide window through which you can see the outside
A tool to repair damaged building blocks
A tool to destroy installed blocks
